channel.title: tornado on 狂人居
channel.description: Recent content in tornado on 狂人居

item.title: 安装Tornado
item.description: 安装Tornado wget https://github.com/downloads/facebook/tornado/tornado-2.2.1.tar.gz tar xvzf tornado-2.2.1.tar.gz cd tornado-2.2.1 python setup.py build python setup.py install 到此，tornado已安装完成。 开启服务，运行hello world程序 cd tornado-2.2.1 ./demos/helloworld/helloworld.py 此时打开浏览器，地址
